verses.t: And{G2532} I looked{G1492}, and{G2532}, lo{G2400}, a Lamb{G721} stood{G2476} on{G1909} the mount{G3588} Sion{G4622}, and{G2532} with{G3326} him{G846} an hundred{G1540} forty{G5062} and four{G5064} thousand{G5505}, having{G2192} his{G846} Father's{G3588} name{G3588} written{G1125} in{G1909} their{G846} foreheads{G3588}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} a voice{G5456} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}, as{G5613} the voice{G5456} of many{G4183} waters{G5204}, and{G2532} as{G5613} the voice{G5456} of a great{G3173} thunder{G1027}: and{G2532} I heard{G191} the voice{G5456} of harpers{G2790} harping{G2789} with{G1722} their{G846} harps{G3588}:

And{G2532} they sung{G103} as it were{G5613} a new{G2537} song{G5603} before{G1799} the throne{G3588}, and{G2532} before{G1799} the four{G5064} beasts{G2226}, and{G2532} the elders{G4245}: and{G2532} no man{G3762} could{G1410} learn{G3129} that{G1487} song{G3588} but{G3361} the hundred{G1540} and forty{G5062} and four{G5064} thousand{G5505}, which{G3588} were redeemed{G59} from{G575} the earth{G3588}.

These{G3778} are{G1526} they which{G3739} were{G3435} not{G3756} defiled{G3435} with{G3326} women{G1135}; for{G1063} they are{G1526} virgins{G3933}. These{G3778} are{G1526} they which{G3588} follow{G190} the Lamb{G3588} whithersoever{G3699} he goeth{G5217}. These{G3778} were redeemed{G59} from{G575} among men{G3588}, being the firstfruits{G536} unto God{G3588} and{G2532} to the Lamb{G3588}.
And{G2532} in{G1722} their{G846} mouth{G3588} was found{G2147} no{G3756} guile{G1388}: for{G1063} they are{G1526} without fault{G299} before{G1799} the throne{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} another{G243} angel{G32} fly{G4072} in{G1722} the midst of heaven{G3321}, having{G2192} the everlasting{G166} gospel{G2098} to preach{G2097} unto them{G3588} that dwell{G2730} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} to every{G3956} nation{G1484}, and{G2532} kindred{G5443}, and{G2532} tongue{G1100}, and{G2532} people{G2992},

And{G2532} there followed{G190} another{G243} angel{G32}, saying{G3004}Babylon{G897} is fallen{G4098}, is fallen{G4098}, that great{G3173} city{G3588}, because{G3754} she made{G4222} all{G3956} nations{G1484} drink{G4222} of{G1537} the wine{G3588} of the wrath{G3588} of her{G846} fornication{G3588}.

And{G2532} the third{G5154} angel{G32} followed{G190} them{G846}, saying{G3004} with{G1722} a loud{G3173} voice{G5456}, If{G1487} any man{G5100} worship{G4352} the beast{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} image{G3588}, and{G2532} receive{G2983} his mark{G5480} in{G1909} his{G846} forehead{G3588}, or{G2228} in{G1909} his{G846} hand{G3588},

The same{G846} shall drink{G4095} of{G1537} the wine{G3588} of the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588}, which{G3588} is poured out{G2767} without mixture{G194} into{G1722} the cup{G3588} of his{G846} indignation{G3588}; and{G2532} he shall be tormented{G928} with{G1722} fire{G4442} and{G2532} brimstone{G2303} in the presence{G1799} of the holy{G40} angels{G32}, and{G2532} in the presence of{G1799} the Lamb{G3588}:UNSURE: Tagging of "kai"

And{G2532} the smoke{G3588} of their{G846} torment{G3588} ascendeth up{G305} for{G1519} ever{G165} and{G2532} ever{G165}: and{G2532} they have{G2192} no{G3756} rest{G372} day{G2250} nor night{G3571}, who{G3588} worship{G4352} the beast{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} image{G3588}, and{G2532} whosoever{G5100} receiveth{G2983} the mark{G3588} of his{G846} name{G3588}.
Here{G5602} is{G2076} the patience{G5281} of the saints{G40}: here{G5602} are they{G3588} that keep{G5083} the commandments{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} the faith{G3588} of Jesus{G2424}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} a voice{G5456} from{G1537} heaven{G3588} saying{G3004} unto me{G3427}, Write{G1125}, Blessed{G3107} are the dead{G3498} which{G3588} die{G599} in{G1722} the Lord{G2962} from henceforth{G534}: Yea{G3483}, saith{G3004} the Spirit{G3588}, that{G2443} they may rest{G373} from{G1537} their{G846} labours{G3588}; and{G1161} their{G846} works{G2041} do follow{G190} them{G846}.

And{G2532} I looked{G1492}, and{G2532} behold{G2400} a white{G3022} cloud{G3507}, and{G2532} upon{G1909} the cloud{G3588} one sat{G2521} like unto{G3664} the Son{G5207} of man{G444}, having{G2192} on{G1909} his{G846} head{G3588} a golden{G5552} crown{G4735}, and{G2532} in{G1722} his{G846} hand{G3588} a sharp{G3691} sickle{G1407}.

And{G2532} another{G243} angel{G32} came{G1831} out of{G1537} the temple{G3588}, crying{G2896} with{G1722} a loud{G3173} voice{G5456} to him{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the cloud{G3588}, Thrust in{G3992} thy{G4675} sickle{G3588}, and{G2532} reap{G2325}: for{G3754} the time{G3588} is come{G2064} for thee{G4671} to reap{G2325}; for{G3754} the harvest{G3588} of the earth{G3588} is ripe{G3583}.
And{G2532} he{G3588} that sat{G2521} on{G1909} the cloud{G3588} thrust{G906} in his{G846} sickle{G3588} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}; and{G2532} the earth{G3588} was reaped{G2325}
And{G2532} another{G243} angel{G32} came{G1831} out of{G1537} the temple{G3588} which is{G3588} in{G1722} heaven{G3588}, he{G846} also{G2532} having{G2192} a sharp{G3691} sickle{G1407}.

And{G2532} another{G243} angel{G32} came{G1831} out from{G1537} the altar{G3588}, which had{G2192} power{G1849} over{G1909} fire{G3588}; and{G2532} cried{G5455} with a loud{G3173} cry{G2906} to him{G3588} that had{G2192} the sharp{G3691} sickle{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Thrust in{G3992} thy{G4675} sharp{G3691} sickle{G3588}, and{G2532} gather{G5166} the clusters{G3588} of the vine{G3588} of the earth; for{G3754} her{G846} grapes{G4718} are fully ripe{G187}.

And{G2532} the angel{G3588} thrust in{G906} his{G846} sickle{G3588} into{G1519} the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} gathered{G5166} the vine{G3588} of the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} cast{G906} it into{G1519} the great{G3173} winepress{G3588} of the wrath{G3588} of God{G3588}.

And{G2532} the winepress{G3588} was trodden{G3961} without{G1854} the city{G3588}, and{G2532} blood{G129} came{G1831} out of{G1537} the winepress{G3588}, even unto{G891} the horse{G3588} bridles{G3588}, by the space of{G575} a thousand{G5507} and six hundred{G1812} furlongs{G4712}.
